value.name: Two Walnut Creek Officers Not Charged in 2019 Fatal Shooting of Miles Hall: DA
value.description: Two Walnut Creek police officers will not face charges in the fatal shooting of a young mentally ill man in 2019, the Contra Costa County District Attorney’s Office confirmed Friday.

video.name: Two Walnut Creek Officers Not Charged in 2019 Fatal Shooting of Miles Hall: DA

value.name: Contra Costa D.A. will not prosecute officers for death of Miles Hall
value.description: Two police officers who shot and killed a mentally ill man in Walnut Creek will not face criminal charges, Contra Costa County District Attorney Diana Becton announced.
